titles.title: Expel Maxine Waters Resolution for Incitement of Violence and Rioting against the United States
In the matter of Representative Maxine Waters.
Expel Maxine Waters Resolution for Incitement of Violence and Rioting against the United States

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Expel Maxine Waters Resolution for Incitement of Violence and Rioting against the United States
This resolution expels Representative Maxine Waters from the House of Representatives.
